Russian: Бубохан с Бобоханом дали тебе деньжат на первое время, угадал? Советую потратить их с толком - купить у меня длинный меч! Просто перетащи его в свой инвентарь.

English: Also, you can sell an item by dragging it into the shop window. Pretty easy, huh? Okay, after buying it, please visit Losha at the Food Shop.
Russian: А если хочешь продать что-нибудь мне, перетащи вещь в окно моего магазина. Как купишь меч, загляни к Люше в продуктовую лавку, хорошо?

English: Losha at the Food Shop is staying in Eastern Flarine which is located to the east of here. You'll have to cross the bridge to get there.
Russian: Люша живет в восточной части города, за мостом.

English: What, you think it's too far? The Food Shop is very important for your journey, you should definitely check it out.
Russian: Напрасно, напрасно. Даже самому отважному герою нужно время от времени подкрепиться!

English: You are new to Madrigal, right? Hi! I have heard a lot about you already! Here, take this. It's a gift from Luda. Talk to me again for you next task!
Russian: Я смотрю, в Мадригале появился новый бродячий артист! И знаешь, Людор о тебе уже очень высокого мнения. Держи, он просил передать тебе вот этот щит.

English: You should buy a Long Sword from Luda at the Shield Shop.
Russian: Купи у меня длинный меч, а затем поговори с Люшей.

English: Losha at the Food Shop will give me a Green Shield and 1,200 Penya when I visit her.
Russian: Нужно поговорить с Люшей, владелицей продуктовой лавки. Она даст мне прочный деревянный щит и 1 200 пенни!

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (1)
Russian: Первые шаги бродяги, часть 1

English: Hello! I am Losha and I run the Food Shop. I sell food that is helpful for when you lose your Health Points (HP). Each type of food has a different recovery power and level requirement.
Russian: Я продаю еду, которая помогает быстро восстановить здоровье. Пища высокого уровня восстанавливает больше здоровья, но и подходит только опытным героям.

English: You can eat the food by double-clicking it in your inventory. Also, you can add them to your hot keys. Please remember that once you eat food, you cannot eat again for a certain amount of time.
Russian: Чтобы съесть пищу, дважды щелкни по ней в инвентаре. Если хочешь, можешь вынести любимые блюда на панель быстрого доступа. И не забывай о перерывах между едой!

English: Now that the lesson is over it is time for some combat! There are a lot of Aibatts to the north. Please hunt 15 Small Aibatts and go back to Luda at the Shield Shop.
Russian: Вот и все! А теперь попробуй одолеть десятка полтора слабых сглазов и расскажи Людору, удобно ли сражаться его оружием. Хорошо?

English: Don't be too nervous and please check your equipment again before you venture out. Oh, and don’t forget to buy some food!
Russian: Don't be too nervous and please check your equipment again before you venture out. Oh, and don’t forget to buy some food!

English: This is only your first step into a larger world. Don't hesitate, go forth and defeat those Small Aibatts!
Russian: Эх, ты! Торговцы Фларинции так старались снарядить тебя для подвигов, а ты сглазов боишься!

English: Great! You completed your task wonderfully! I can see that you will be very famous one day. If you talk to me again, I will give you another task which will be a little bit harder.
Russian: Как оружие? Не подвело? Отлично! Чувствую, однажды ты прославишь наш город! Пожалуй, нужно дать тебе другое испытание, посерьезней.

English: You should hunt 15 Small Aibatts. Please check in the quest window (Q Key) and return to Luda at the Shield Shop once you're finished.
Russian: Убей полтора десятка слабых сглазов и поговори с Людором. Если забудешь, что нужно сделать, посмотри в дневнике (Q)!

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 2,500 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Aibatts and return to him.
Russian: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 2,500 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Aibatts and return to him.

English: A Vagrant's First Steps (2)
Russian: Первые шаги бродяги, часть 2

English: I didn’t know that you could accomplish so much this fast! How wonderful! I have one more request for you. There are other monsters around Flarine. They are called Mushpangs.
Russian: Битву со сглазами твое оружие выдержало, но выдержит ли оно бой с сыробежками? Нужно проверить.

English: Please wipe them out! If you hunt 10 Small Mushpangs and 5 normal Mushpangs, I will give you a reward. Oh, and hold onto any trophies they drop, as they will be very useful in the near future!
Russian: Попробуй одолеть 10 слабых и 5 обычных сыробежек, ладно? И собирай трофеи, даже самые странные! Никогда не знаешь, где они пригодятся.

English: Yeah, I knew you could do this!
Russian: Ну, держитесь, сыробежки!

English: Mushpangs are very easy for you to hunt! Help protect Flarine from this menace!
Russian: Так дело не пойдет. А если оружие недостаточно крепкое и подведет тебя в бою с кем-нибудь пострашнее сыробежек?

English: It appears there is no monster that can threaten you around Flarine. It's time for you to step out into the world and show your power! Your adventure has just started!
Russian: Теперь я спокоен и за тебя, и за твое снаряжение. Не буду больше тебя задерживать. Отправляйся навстречу приключениям. Перед тобой открыт весь мир!

English: You didn’t hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang yet.
Russian: You didn’t hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang yet.

English: Luda at the Shield Shop will give me 10,000 Penya when I hunt 15 Small Mushpang and 15 Mushpang, and then return to him.
Russian: Людор даст мне 10 000 пенни, если я убью 10 слабых и 5 обычных сыробежек.

English: Flaris
Russian: Flaris

English: Saint Morning
Russian: Санто Морген

English: Darkon
Russian: Darkon

English: 1st Job Change
Russian: Первое амплуа

English: 2nd Job Change
Russian: Второе амплуа

English: Mars Dungeon
Russian: Марсова шахта

English: Laws of Aviation (1)
Russian: Laws of Aviation (1)

English: Hello traveler! It looks like you've reached level 20! You know what this means right? You can now fly on your very own flying device!
Russian: Hello traveler! It looks like you've reached level 20! You know what this means right? You can now fly on your very own flying device!

English: Scared? Don't worry, go see the Station Manager Dior. She'll show you the ropes and get you flying in no time!
Russian: Scared? Don't worry, go see the Station Manager Dior. She'll show you the ropes and get you flying in no time!

English: Dior is on Flarine Station. Take the elevator right in front of me. You can't miss it!
Russian: Dior is on Flarine Station. Take the elevator right in front of me. You can't miss it!

English: You don't have to be scared. Well... if you change your mind, do let me know! I'll be right here.
Russian: You don't have to be scared. Well... if you change your mind, do let me know! I'll be right here.

English: What's this? Is sent you? Oh! you want to know about flying on your own flying device? Why didn't you say so?
Russian: What's this? Is sent you? Oh! you want to know about flying on your own flying device? Why didn't you say so?

English: Visit Dior to learn all about flying.
Russian: Visit Dior to learn all about flying.

English: Laws of Aviation (2)
Russian: Laws of Aviation (2)

English: So you've finally reached level 20! This is the perfect time to learn how to operate your very own flying device.
Russian: So you've finally reached level 20! This is the perfect time to learn how to operate your very own flying device.

English: The first thing you need to do is buy a flying device. Come back to me when you have one. I sell Boards & Brooms so take a look in my Store.
Russian: The first thing you need to do is buy a flying device. Come back to me when you have one. I sell Boards & Brooms so take a look in my Store.

English: Buy a flying device of your choice, and report back to me.
Russian: Buy a flying device of your choice, and report back to me.

English: Let me know when you're ready.
Russian: Let me know when you're ready.

English: You've made your choice? Great, let's get started!
Russian: You've made your choice? Great, let's get started!

English: Buy a flying device and report back to Dior.
Russian: Buy a flying device and report back to Dior.

English: Laws of Aviation (3)
Russian: Laws of Aviation (3)

English: Now that you have your very own flying device, I'm going to assign you a test. That's right, a test! Just for fun of course. Hehe~
Russian: Now that you have your very own flying device, I'm going to assign you a test. That's right, a test! Just for fun of course. Hehe~

English: I want you to fly to the North of Saint City, and meet my associate Tina. Once you've arrived, let her know I sent you. She'll know what to do from there. I've sent countless travelers before you!
Russian: I want you to fly to the North of Saint City, and meet my associate Tina. Once you've arrived, let her know I sent you. She'll know what to do from there. I've sent countless travelers before you!

English: Tina is at Saint City Station. That's the most northern part of Saint City. It's the biggest Station in Madrigal, I'm sure you won't miss it!
Russian: Tina is at Saint City Station. That's the most northern part of Saint City. It's the biggest Station in Madrigal, I'm sure you won't miss it!

English: Not ready yet? That's fine. Just let me know when you're up to the task.
Russian: Not ready yet? That's fine. Just let me know when you're up to the task.

English: What's this? Dior sent you? Another traveler taking Diors Flying test? You're the first one in a while! Just give me a moment. I'll be with you shortly.
Russian: What's this? Dior sent you? Another traveler taking Diors Flying test? You're the first one in a while! Just give me a moment. I'll be with you shortly.

English: Fly to Saint City
Russian: Fly to Saint City

English: Laws of Aviation (4)
Russian: Laws of Aviation (4)

English: Alright, sorry about that. I just had to finish some important paperwork. Now, where were we?
Russian: Alright, sorry about that. I just had to finish some important paperwork. Now, where were we?

English: *cough* ...Oh! The test, right. Sorry! To get you more familiar with your flying device, I want you to experience Air Combat! Yes, you can also fight in the air! It's very similar to regular Combat, actually.
Russian: *cough* ...Oh! The test, right. Sorry! To get you more familiar with your flying device, I want you to experience Air Combat! Yes, you can also fight in the air! It's very similar to regular Combat, actually.

English: You can even use skills in the air. Give it a try! Go and kill some of those Pesky Captain Mothbees flying near the northwestern edge of Saint City.
Russian: You can even use skills in the air. Give it a try! Go and kill some of those Pesky Captain Mothbees flying near the northwestern edge of Saint City.

English: You'll find the Mothbees flying inbetween Flaris and Saint Morning. They seem to gather near the giant gears. Killing 5 should be enough. Report back to me once you're done.
Russian: You'll find the Mothbees flying inbetween Flaris and Saint Morning. They seem to gather near the giant gears. Killing 5 should be enough. Report back to me once you're done.

English: They're just bugs, they're not that scary! *sigh* Let me know when you've found enough courage.
Russian: They're just bugs, they're not that scary! *sigh* Let me know when you've found enough courage.

English: Wow impressive! You've really got a knack for this. Well done. You've passed the test!
Russian: Wow impressive! You've really got a knack for this. Well done. You've passed the test!

English: Kill 5 Captain Mothbees then return back to Tina.
Russian: Kill 5 Captain Mothbees then return back to Tina.

English: Laws of Aviation (5)
Russian: Laws of Aviation (5)

English: Oh, back already? That was fast! You sure made quick work of those Mothbees.
Russian: Oh, back already? That was fast! You sure made quick work of those Mothbees.

English: Here, take this letter. Please deliver it to Dior in Flarine. It's a Letter of Recommendation. Once she reads it I'm sure she'll give you a reward! Hehe~
Russian: Here, take this letter. Please deliver it to Dior in Flarine. It's a Letter of Recommendation. Once she reads it I'm sure she'll give you a reward! Hehe~

English: Have a safe journey back to Flaris. See you again soon! Tell my sweetie Dior I said hi!
Russian: Have a safe journey back to Flaris. See you again soon! Tell my sweetie Dior I said hi!

English: There's no rush. Just talk to me again when you are ready.
Russian: There's no rush. Just talk to me again when you are ready.

English: Welcome back traveler. What's this? A letter of recommendation? Let's see... *mumble mumble* ...wow! Passed with flying colors I see! Well done!
Russian: Welcome back traveler. What's this? A letter of recommendation? Let's see... *mumble mumble* ...wow! Passed with flying colors I see! Well done!

English: Deliver the letter to Dior.
Russian: Deliver the letter to Dior.

English: Take to the Skies!
Russian: Take to the Skies!

English: I knew there was something special about you. After reading this letter it seems Tina has taken a liking to you too! What does the letter say, you ask? That's a secret!
Russian: I knew there was something special about you. After reading this letter it seems Tina has taken a liking to you too! What does the letter say, you ask? That's a secret!

English: Congratulations on passing the Initial Test. I'll prepare a reward. It's an experimental fuel that gives your flying device a temporary speed boost!
Russian: Congratulations on passing the Initial Test. I'll prepare a reward. It's an experimental fuel that gives your flying device a temporary speed boost!

English: When you have time come speak to me again. I'll prepare the reward for you now.
Russian: When you have time come speak to me again. I'll prepare the reward for you now.

English: Speak to me when you get a moment. I'll prepare the reward for you.
Russian: Speak to me when you get a moment. I'll prepare the reward for you.

English: Your reward is ready! Here you go! Come see me again once you've gained more experience. I'm sure I'll have more "Tests" for you! *wink*
Russian: Your reward is ready! Here you go! Come see me again once you've gained more experience. I'm sure I'll have more "Tests" for you! *wink*

English: Speak with Dior to claim your reward.
Russian: Speak with Dior to claim your reward.

English: Returning Mission
Russian: Returning Mission

English: Menacing Phantom
Russian: Menacing Phantom

English: The final task awaits. Please eliminate Serus Uriel. If we don't eliminate her now while she's weakened, Flaris will be in grave danger.
Russian: The final task awaits. Please eliminate Serus Uriel. If we don't eliminate her now while she's weakened, Flaris will be in grave danger.

English: Use the key I gave you to enter her lair. Please be careful, the monsters inside are on whole other level compared to the Guardians. It would be wise to form a party before entering her chamber.
Russian: Use the key I gave you to enter her lair. Please be careful, the monsters inside are on whole other level compared to the Guardians. It would be wise to form a party before entering her chamber.

English: There is no time. Please rethink this through...
Russian: There is no time. Please rethink this through...

English: You've returned! Flaris can be at peace once again. Thank you, adventurer. Please take this as a reward. You have my gratitude.
Russian: You've returned! Flaris can be at peace once again. Thank you, adventurer. Please take this as a reward. You have my gratitude.

English: The main thing is you are still alive. Take time to recover, and try again! You can do this!
Russian: The main thing is you are still alive. Take time to recover, and try again! You can do this!

English: Defeat 3 Worm Veduques and eliminate Serus Uriel. Use the Mars Dungeon key to enter her chamber.
Russian: Defeat 3 Worm Veduques and eliminate Serus Uriel. Use the Mars Dungeon key to enter her chamber.

English: Azria
Russian: Azria

English: Welcome to Azria!
Russian: Welcome to Azria!

English: Welcome to Azria, one of the coldest places in Madrigal!
Russian: Welcome to Azria, one of the coldest places in Madrigal!

English: This town is a haven in this dangerous place. Masquerpets have overrun the entire continent and made much of this land uninhabitable.
Russian: This town is a haven in this dangerous place. Masquerpets have overrun the entire continent and made much of this land uninhabitable.

English: We see you have come a long way to get here. I bet it was a very dangerous journey! You must be very brave.
Russian: We see you have come a long way to get here. I bet it was a very dangerous journey! You must be very brave.

English: Feel free to stay as long as you need to. Go and visit Gigaka, our protector. He will help you stay safe.
Russian: Feel free to stay as long as you need to. Go and visit Gigaka, our protector. He will help you stay safe.

English: Welcome to Azria! (2)
Russian: Welcome to Azria! (2)

English: Azria is a dangerous place. You are lucky you made it here and lived.
Russian: Azria is a dangerous place. You are lucky you made it here and lived.

English: I help protect this small town. Dangerous Masquerpets are everywhere.
Russian: I help protect this small town. Dangerous Masquerpets are everywhere.

English: I could use some help fighting them off. If you are interested, feel free to drop by and lend me your assistance.
Russian: I could use some help fighting them off. If you are interested, feel free to drop by and lend me your assistance.

English: Stay within this town and you will be safe from harm. Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Russian: Stay within this town and you will be safe from harm. Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.

English: Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.
Russian: Go and visit Mawrang. He is the oldest and wisest of us all. He will help you survive out in the cold.

English: Welcome, brave warrior. I hope this town serves as your safe haven during your perilous journey here.
Russian: Welcome, brave warrior. I hope this town serves as your safe haven during your perilous journey here.

English: This town could really use your help. We are surrounded in every corner of this continent.
Russian: This town could really use your help. We are surrounded in every corner of this continent.

English: Our people have a lot of hope, but I fear the threat grows stronger and stronger every day.
Russian: Our people have a lot of hope, but I fear the threat grows stronger and stronger every day.

English: We thank you for your help. I hope our hospitality suffices for your needs.
Russian: We thank you for your help. I hope our hospitality suffices for your needs.

English: Old Machinery
Russian: Old Machinery

English: So you want to help me fight off masquerpets, huh? Good.
Russian: So you want to help me fight off masquerpets, huh? Good.

English: The entrance to Azria was once an industrious place. It is now overrun by ancient machines. Help me bring down their numbers so other travelers may enter this place more safely.
Russian: The entrance to Azria was once an industrious place. It is now overrun by ancient machines. Help me bring down their numbers so other travelers may enter this place more safely.

English: Will you help me?
Russian: Will you help me?

English: Good. Get going then. The fighting never stops.
Russian: Good. Get going then. The fighting never stops.

English: Come back when you think you are ready.
Russian: Come back when you think you are ready.

English: It appears your efforts were a success. Thank you.
Russian: It appears your efforts were a success. Thank you.

English: Not enough monsters have been defeated, unfortunately. You must go back and fight.
Russian: Not enough monsters have been defeated, unfortunately. You must go back and fight.

English: Squash the Sasquatch!
Russian: Squash the Sasquatch!

English: We meet again, traveler. We need more help. Rumor has it that the Yetti are becoming more aggressive towards humans. We can't allow this to continue happening.
Russian: We meet again, traveler. We need more help. Rumor has it that the Yetti are becoming more aggressive towards humans. We can't allow this to continue happening.

English: Will you lend me a hand once more, traveler?
Russian: Will you lend me a hand once more, traveler?

English: Please defeat 70 Yetti and 55 Mutant Yetti and return to me as soon as you're finished.
Russian: Please defeat 70 Yetti and 55 Mutant Yetti and return to me as soon as you're finished.

English: Town Fortification
Russian: Town Fortification

English: It seems as though the masquerpets are a greater threat than I thought. We will need to fortify our town as soon as possible.
Russian: It seems as though the masquerpets are a greater threat than I thought. We will need to fortify our town as soon as possible.

English: Bring us some wood and stone. We can make good use of it and reinforce our buildings and fences.
Russian: Bring us some wood and stone. We can make good use of it and reinforce our buildings and fences.

English: Please bring back 20 Wood & 20 Stone. You can obtain the Wood from most kinds of Yetti and Stone from most kinds of Augu.
Russian: Please bring back 20 Wood & 20 Stone. You can obtain the Wood from most kinds of Yetti and Stone from most kinds of Augu.

English: That will not be enough, sadly!
Russian: That will not be enough, sadly!

English: Thank you so much! We will put these materials to good use.
Russian: Thank you so much! We will put these materials to good use.

English: Now our town is stronger than ever! Unfortunately, we are still lacking a lot of resources.
Russian: Now our town is stronger than ever! Unfortunately, we are still lacking a lot of resources.

English: Azria used to have a field of crystals that we would use for energy and magic, but these have been devoured by a crazed Augu that has gone absolutely mad.
Russian: Azria used to have a field of crystals that we would use for energy and magic, but these have been devoured by a crazed Augu that has gone absolutely mad.

English: The Glacial Augu is now overpowered from all of this crystal essence and has become nearly unstoppable. Can you help us defeat it and retrieve its crystal essence?
Russian: The Glacial Augu is now overpowered from all of this crystal essence and has become nearly unstoppable. Can you help us defeat it and retrieve its crystal essence?

English: Good luck!
Russian: Удачи!

English: I understand. It's a difficult task. I will wait for you to get stronger.
Russian: I understand. It's a difficult task. I will wait for you to get stronger.

English: The Frosty Beast
Russian: The Frosty Beast

English: Amazing! And you did that all by yourself I bet!
Russian: Amazing! And you did that all by yourself I bet!

English: Keep trying! I believe in you!
Russian: Keep trying! I believe in you!

English: Now that we have all of this crystal essence, we can enforce our town and create a magical barrier that no monster, Violet or not, can ever break through.
Russian: Now that we have all of this crystal essence, we can enforce our town and create a magical barrier that no monster, Violet or not, can ever break through.

English: We thank you for all of your help! Stay safe out there.
Russian: We thank you for all of your help! Stay safe out there.

English: Lost Souls
Russian: Lost Souls

English: While we may be safe for now thanks to your help, the armies of Shade are advancing.
Russian: While we may be safe for now thanks to your help, the armies of Shade are advancing.

English: Shade is summoning the very dead to fight against us. Ghosts of the forgotten rulers have completely taken over the old ruins of Azria.
Russian: Shade is summoning the very dead to fight against us. Ghosts of the forgotten rulers have completely taken over the old ruins of Azria.

English: Bring Mawrang some of their remains so they can be studied. Maybe we can learn something.
Russian: Bring Mawrang some of their remains so they can be studied. Maybe we can learn something.

English: Hm... yes... That is interesting.
Russian: Hm... yes... That is interesting.

English: That may not be enough, hm.
Russian: That may not be enough, hm.

English: Overlord
Russian: Overlord

English: There is very dark and evil power behind these masquerpets. I fear my suspicions are correct.
Russian: There is very dark and evil power behind these masquerpets. I fear my suspicions are correct.

English: Some of these masquerpets are being empowered by giant variants. This gives them enough power to break through our barrier!
Russian: Some of these masquerpets are being empowered by giant variants. This gives them enough power to break through our barrier!

English: We must defeat these giants at once!
Russian: We must defeat these giants at once!

English: Hurry! We do not have much time left.
Russian: Hurry! We do not have much time left.

English: Very unfortunate...
Russian: Very unfortunate...

English: That was a close call. Thank you.
Russian: That was a close call. Thank you.

English: We must defeat more than that.
Russian: We must defeat more than that.

English: Our barrier is safe for now, but there appears to be another army approaching much closer now. This one is a far graver threat than any we have ever faced.
Russian: Our barrier is safe for now, but there appears to be another army approaching much closer now. This one is a far graver threat than any we have ever faced.

English: We must prepare for this battle. Speak to Auxilior as soon as possible.
Russian: We must prepare for this battle. Speak to Auxilior as soon as possible.

English: There is no time to waste. We must strengthen our magic barrier and gather materials. Slay some Augu and gather what little Crystal Essence they may have shared from the Glacial Augu.
Russian: There is no time to waste. We must strengthen our magic barrier and gather materials. Slay some Augu and gather what little Crystal Essence they may have shared from the Glacial Augu.

English: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.
Russian: Once you do, bring us a hammer from a Lord Yetti. This is a formidable weapon that we can use to defend ourselves.

English: Prepare for Battle! (1)
Russian: Prepare for Battle! (1)

English: Let's go then.
Russian: Let's go then.

English: It's time to face off against the Mammoths. The most fearsome and terrible creature I have ever laid my eyes upon in this place.
Russian: It's time to face off against the Mammoths. The most fearsome and terrible creature I have ever laid my eyes upon in this place.

English: This will not be an easy battle. May Rhisis be with you.
Russian: This will not be an easy battle. May Rhisis be with you.

English: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.
Russian: Kill 100 Cannibal Mammoths and last but not least, the Lord Mammoth.

English: You are truly a great warrior and an even greater friend. We owe our lives to you.
Russian: You are truly a great warrior and an even greater friend. We owe our lives to you.

English: We must battle on. I believe in you.
Russian: We must battle on. I believe in you.

English: We are safe now. I know this may not be much, but take this as a sign of our appreciation. You will always be remembered here.
Russian: We are safe now. I know this may not be much, but take this as a sign of our appreciation. You will always be remembered here.

English: Prepare for Battle! (2)
Russian: Prepare for Battle! (2)

English: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.
Russian: Slay Augu and gather Crystal Essence. Also obtain a hammer from a Lord Yetti.

English: Raising Pets 1 (Egg -> F Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 1 (Egg -> F Tier)

English: Nice egg, stranger. I'm sure you're wondering what kind of pet you'll get from it. Well, don't get too far ahead of yourself now. I can't guarantee you're going to be able to hatch it.
Russian: Nice egg, stranger. I'm sure you're wondering what kind of pet you'll get from it. Well, don't get too far ahead of yourself now. I can't guarantee you're going to be able to hatch it.

English: However, if you really take care of the egg there shouldn't be a problem. All you need to do is get the egg's experience (EXP) to 99.99% and then bring it back to me. Think you can do that?
Russian: However, if you really take care of the egg there shouldn't be a problem. All you need to do is get the egg's experience (EXP) to 99.99% and then bring it back to me. Think you can do that?

English: Sounds good! Alright, listen. In order to bring your egg's experience to full, you're going to need to feed it while it's summoned. Find yourself some Pet Candy (F) and get started!
Russian: Sounds good! Alright, listen. In order to bring your egg's experience to full, you're going to need to feed it while it's summoned. Find yourself some Pet Candy (F) and get started!

English: Well that's a shame. I can't say I'm surprised, though. From the looks of you, you probably couldn't even keep a cactus alive.
Russian: Well that's a shame. I can't say I'm surprised, though. From the looks of you, you probably couldn't even keep a cactus alive.

English: Great job with the egg, stranger! Tell you what, I'll take over from here. It's hatching time!
Russian: Great job with the egg, stranger! Tell you what, I'll take over from here. It's hatching time!

English: You're going to need to get your egg's experience to 99.99% in order for me to hatch it for you. Feel free to stop by again once you've done this!
Russian: You're going to need to get your egg's experience to 99.99% in order for me to hatch it for you. Feel free to stop by again once you've done this!

English: The Pet Tamer has asked you to feed your egg some Pet Candy until it reaches 99.99% EXP. Once you've done that, return to him and he will hatch it for you!
Russian: The Pet Tamer has asked you to feed your egg some Pet Candy until it reaches 99.99% EXP. Once you've done that, return to him and he will hatch it for you!

English: Raising Pets 2 (F Tier -> E Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 2 (F Tier -> E Tier)

English: Now that you're pet has been hatched, it will increase specific character statistics (Stat Points) depending on the type of pet you have summoned. Every pet type affects a specific character statistic.
Russian: Now that you're pet has been hatched, it will increase specific character statistics (Stat Points) depending on the type of pet you have summoned. Every pet type affects a specific character statistic.

English: Feed your pet the appropriate Pet Candy and it will gain experience. If you bring your pet's experience to 99.99% again, I'll upgrade it! How does that sound?
Russian: Feed your pet the appropriate Pet Candy and it will gain experience. If you bring your pet's experience to 99.99% again, I'll upgrade it! How does that sound?

English: If your pet's energy runs out, it can't help you. When it's energy gets low, you better feed it to keep the bonuses! Now, go and spend some time with your pet! Come back when you've gained enough experience.
Russian: If your pet's energy runs out, it can't help you. When it's energy gets low, you better feed it to keep the bonuses! Now, go and spend some time with your pet! Come back when you've gained enough experience.

English: Really? You're not interested in advancing your pet's abilities? Fine, have it your way. What a shame…
Russian: Really? You're not interested in advancing your pet's abilities? Fine, have it your way. What a shame…

English: Great job with your pet, my friend! I'll take it from here!
Russian: Great job with your pet, my friend! I'll take it from here!

English: You need to spend more time with your pet. It hasn't acquired enough experience to be upgraded yet. Stop back by when his experience reaches 99.99%!
Russian: You need to spend more time with your pet. It hasn't acquired enough experience to be upgraded yet. Stop back by when his experience reaches 99.99%!

English: Bring your pet's experience to 99.99% and the Pet Tamer will upgrade it for you!
Russian: Bring your pet's experience to 99.99% and the Pet Tamer will upgrade it for you!

English: Raising Pets 3 (E Tier -> D Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 3 (E Tier -> D Tier)

English: The higher the level granted for a particular tier (F, E, D, C, B, A or S), the higher the affected character statistic will be. The level granted is always random. Cool huh?
Russian: The higher the level granted for a particular tier (F, E, D, C, B, A or S), the higher the affected character statistic will be. The level granted is always random. Cool huh?

English: E Tier Pets such as this one have 2 levels available (1 - 2) and you achieved a random level during the last upgrade. Will you see me when your pet reaches 99.99% experience again?
Russian: E Tier Pets such as this one have 2 levels available (1 - 2) and you achieved a random level during the last upgrade. Will you see me when your pet reaches 99.99% experience again?

English: Great! I'll see you when you get back. Good luck, and don't forget to feed your pet!
Russian: Great! I'll see you when you get back. Good luck, and don't forget to feed your pet!

English: Don't give up now, you're doing such a great job!
Russian: Don't give up now, you're doing such a great job!

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to D tier now!
Russian: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to D tier now!

English: Stop back by when your pet reaches 99.99% experience.
Russian: Stop back by when your pet reaches 99.99% experience.

English: Raising Pets 4 (D Tier -> C Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 4 (D Tier -> C Tier)

English: Excellent job raising your pet so far, my friend. You two certainly look happy together!
Russian: Excellent job raising your pet so far, my friend. You two certainly look happy together!

English: I'm sure you've noticed by now that the higher the level granted for a particular tier, the higher the benefit to your Stats.
Russian: I'm sure you've noticed by now that the higher the level granted for a particular tier, the higher the benefit to your Stats.

English: No pain, no gain. I'm sure you know the drill by now. Bring the experience of your pet to 99.99% and bring it back to me. I will upgrade it when your done.
Russian: No pain, no gain. I'm sure you know the drill by now. Bring the experience of your pet to 99.99% and bring it back to me. I will upgrade it when your done.

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to C tier now!
Russian: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to C tier now!

English: Not quite there… your pet needs more experience. I'm sure you already knew that.
Russian: Not quite there… your pet needs more experience. I'm sure you already knew that.

English: Raising Pets 5 (C Tier -> B Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 5 (C Tier -> B Tier)

English: I can see that you and your pet have been through a great deal together. You're almost there!
Russian: I can see that you and your pet have been through a great deal together. You're almost there!

English: I'll upgrade your pet to *S level* using magic handed down through my family. All you have to do is get the experience of your pet to 99.99%. You've done it before, will you do it the one last time?
Russian: I'll upgrade your pet to *S level* using magic handed down through my family. All you have to do is get the experience of your pet to 99.99%. You've done it before, will you do it the one last time?

English: I knew you would. It looks like both you and your pet are ready to begin.
Russian: I knew you would. It looks like both you and your pet are ready to begin.

English: Does this mean you are giving up on your pet?
Russian: Does this mean you are giving up on your pet?

English: Congratulations! As long as you have your pet, you will never be alone. Your pet seems to be very happy, you've done a great job. Now allow me to apply the final upgrade!
Russian: Congratulations! As long as you have your pet, you will never be alone. Your pet seems to be very happy, you've done a great job. Now allow me to apply the final upgrade!

English: You are so close to getting your pet to its ultimate level. Do not give up now.
Russian: You are so close to getting your pet to its ultimate level. Do not give up now.

English: Raising Pets 6 (B Tier -> A Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 6 (B Tier -> A Tier)

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to B tier now!
Russian: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to B tier now!

English: Raising Pets 7 (A Tier -> S Tier)
Russian: Raising Pets 7 (A Tier -> S Tier)

English: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to A tier now!
Russian: The two of you are becoming stronger together, and it looks like you guys have become pretty good friends in the process. Excellent! I will upgrade your pet to A tier now!

English: Volkane
Russian: Вулкан

English: Finding the Guardians
Russian: Finding the Guardians

English: A great terror lies within this volcano. A cataclysmic maelstrom is said to have erupted this volcano and carved out these caverns.
Russian: A great terror lies within this volcano. A cataclysmic maelstrom is said to have erupted this volcano and carved out these caverns.

English: The Red Meteonyker is one of the most dangerous Masquerpets in all of Madrigal. As a fearsome creation of Shade, I do not know of many who have survived his fiery breath. This abomination has been sealed away for many ages.
Russian: The Red Meteonyker is one of the most dangerous Masquerpets in all of Madrigal. As a fearsome creation of Shade, I do not know of many who have survived his fiery breath. This abomination has been sealed away for many ages.

English: Many adventurers like yourself who battle Masquerpets in Darkon are unaware of the grave danger that lies below them. The walls are giving way and the Red Meteonyker may not be tempered much longer.
Russian: Many adventurers like yourself who battle Masquerpets in Darkon are unaware of the grave danger that lies below them. The walls are giving way and the Red Meteonyker may not be tempered much longer.

English: You think you can face the Red Meteonyker? I do not wish such a grim fate on anyone. However... you have survived the horrors of Darkon, so you must be very strong. Maybe I am being too skeptical. There may be some hope after all.
Russian: You think you can face the Red Meteonyker? I do not wish such a grim fate on anyone. However... you have survived the horrors of Darkon, so you must be very strong. Maybe I am being too skeptical. There may be some hope after all.

English: Many of us guardians were annihilated when sealing the Red Meteonyker away. Only three of us are left, and each of us holds a piece of the key needed to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker. You must find them and obtain each piece.
Russian: Many of us guardians were annihilated when sealing the Red Meteonyker away. Only three of us are left, and each of us holds a piece of the key needed to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker. You must find them and obtain each piece.

English: Can you help me find my long-lost guardian allies and defeat the Red Meteonyker once and for all?
Russian: Can you help me find my long-lost guardian allies and defeat the Red Meteonyker once and for all?

English: Very well. Here is the first piece of the key. There are threats in this cavern other than the Red Meteonyker. Good luck.
Russian: Very well. Here is the first piece of the key. There are threats in this cavern other than the Red Meteonyker. Good luck.

English: Wise decision. Stay safe, traveler.
Russian: Wise decision. Stay safe, traveler.

English: You have not found any guardians yet? That is fine. We will find them eventually.
Russian: You have not found any guardians yet? That is fine. We will find them eventually.

English: Find Obnis.
Russian: Find Obnis.

English: Kumah is alive? I see. And I see you have one of the three pieces of the key with you. You must be fearless for wanting to face the Red Meteonyker alone.
Russian: Kumah is alive? I see. And I see you have one of the three pieces of the key with you. You must be fearless for wanting to face the Red Meteonyker alone.

English: As Kumah may have told you, our power is not as strong as it once was. This place takes a toll on your strength.
Russian: As Kumah may have told you, our power is not as strong as it once was. This place takes a toll on your strength.

English: I have unfortunately been trapped in this spot for a while. I can take on Meteonykers, but some powerful Berserk Meteonykers have been swarming the place in search of us guardians.
Russian: I have unfortunately been trapped in this spot for a while. I can take on Meteonykers, but some powerful Berserk Meteonykers have been swarming the place in search of us guardians.

English: Can you help me escape? In return, I will give you the second piece of the key you will need to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker.
Russian: Can you help me escape? In return, I will give you the second piece of the key you will need to enter the lair of the Red Meteonyker.

English: Why thank you, kind stranger. I will wait here for you.
Russian: Why thank you, kind stranger. I will wait here for you.

English: Hmph. I'll just give up then...
Russian: Hmph. I'll just give up then...

English: I knew I could count on you!
Russian: I knew I could count on you!

English: My dear traveler, there are still too many Berserk Meteonykers!
Russian: My dear traveler, there are still too many Berserk Meteonykers!

English: Finding the Guardians (2)
Russian: Finding the Guardians (2)

English: Finding the Guardians (3)
Russian: Finding the Guardians (3)

English: Test of Strength
Russian: Test of Strength

English: Kill 3 Berserk Meteonykers
Russian: Kill 3 Berserk Meteonykers

English: There is only one piece left, in the hands of our fellow guardian Airon. She is stubborn though, and you might need to convince her... if you can find her.
Russian: There is only one piece left, in the hands of our fellow guardian Airon. She is stubborn though, and you might need to convince her... if you can find her.

English: The other two guardians may still be alive, but you are foolish to come here. Nobody is strong enough to face the Red Meteonyker.
Russian: The other two guardians may still be alive, but you are foolish to come here. Nobody is strong enough to face the Red Meteonyker.

English: Kumah spoke to you? That's okay. He has too much faith in people. I'm a bit of a skeptic. Nothing has ever gone right in this terrible place for us.
Russian: Kumah spoke to you? That's okay. He has too much faith in people. I'm a bit of a skeptic. Nothing has ever gone right in this terrible place for us.

English: Show me a convincing display of your strength. This chamber is filled with Katamaws, a ferocious beast that cannot be tamed. Kill 70 of them and I may consider trusting your abilities.
Russian: Show me a convincing display of your strength. This chamber is filled with Katamaws, a ferocious beast that cannot be tamed. Kill 70 of them and I may consider trusting your abilities.

English: Go on then.
Russian: Go on then.

English: You surprise me. I was wrong about you.
Russian: You surprise me. I was wrong about you.

English: That's not nearly enough.
Russian: That's not nearly enough.

English: I kept my word. You now have all three pieces of the key.
Russian: I kept my word. You now have all three pieces of the key.

English: In order to merge them and unlock the entrance to the Red Meteonyker, you must find a guardian forger.
Russian: In order to merge them and unlock the entrance to the Red Meteonyker, you must find a guardian forger.

English: Most were wiped out long ago. You must find any survivors and bring the key together once again.
Russian: Most were wiped out long ago. You must find any survivors and bring the key together once again.

English: What brings you here?
Russian: What brings you here?

English: Airon sent you? And I see you have all three pieces of the key. Then there is no time to waste.
Russian: Airon sent you? And I see you have all three pieces of the key. Then there is no time to waste.

English: I can reforge the key for you, but I require a lot of life source to do so.
Russian: I can reforge the key for you, but I require a lot of life source to do so.

English: Ever since the Red Meteonyker has been wreaking havoc in his chamber, the armies of Shade have swarmed this place. Cyclops X are everywhere, and the entrance is now kept by undead guardians.
Russian: Ever since the Red Meteonyker has been wreaking havoc in his chamber, the armies of Shade have swarmed this place. Cyclops X are everywhere, and the entrance is now kept by undead guardians.

English: Weaken the armies of the Cyclops X and defeat their lieutenant to obtain one of their life gems and bring it to me.
Russian: Weaken the armies of the Cyclops X and defeat their lieutenant to obtain one of their life gems and bring it to me.

English: Now stand back as I forge the key.
Russian: Now stand back as I forge the key.

English: This is no time to play games. Go now and finish the task. We must hurry!
Russian: This is no time to play games. Go now and finish the task. We must hurry!

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Russian: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.

English: Why are you still here? You must defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Russian: Why are you still here? You must defeat the Red Meteonyker!

English: I would say your victory calls for a celebration, but the armies of Shade are still here. There is a lot left to do in this forsaken place.
Russian: I would say your victory calls for a celebration, but the armies of Shade are still here. There is a lot left to do in this forsaken place.

English: You are a lot more powerful than I thought you were. I am sure the other guardians are proud of your victory. I know I am. Thank you.
Russian: You are a lot more powerful than I thought you were. I am sure the other guardians are proud of your victory. I know I am. Thank you.

English: The Red Meteonyker
Russian: The Red Meteonyker

English: Here it is. The key has been reforged just as planned. Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Russian: Here it is. The key has been reforged just as planned. Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Russian: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.

English: Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Russian: Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.

English: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Russian: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!

English: Master
Russian: Master

English: Master Grade (1)
Russian: Master Grade (1)

English: Reach level 70
Russian: Reach level 70

English: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?
Russian: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?

English: I have a proposal for you. I take a few levels from you, of course temporarily, and you will accomplish a task for me. What do you have to gain? Everything!
Russian: I have a proposal for you. I take a few levels from you, of course temporarily, and you will accomplish a task for me. What do you have to gain? Everything!

English: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.
Russian: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.

English: Be careful though, your experience will be halved for the duration of this short mission!
Russian: Be careful though, your experience will be halved for the duration of this short mission!

English: Obviously, if you change your mind, you can abandon the quest at any time through your quest window and I will give you back your levels, of course!
Russian: Obviously, if you change your mind, you can abandon the quest at any time through your quest window and I will give you back your levels, of course!

English: So, what do you think?
Russian: So, what do you think?

English: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!
Russian: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!

English: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.
Russian: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.

English: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!
Russian: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!

English: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!
Russian: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!

English: Master Grade (2)
Russian: Master Grade (2)

English: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?
Russian: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?

English: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!
Russian: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!

English: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!
Russian: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!

English: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?
Russian: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?

English: Great! Then I’ll wait here!
Russian: Great! Then I’ll wait here!

English: No problem, just come back!
Russian: No problem, just come back!

English: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.
Russian: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.

Russian: Reach level 80

Russian: Master Grade (3)

Russian: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?

English: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
Russian: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
