English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.
Russian: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.
Russian: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.
Russian: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.
Russian: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.

English: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Russian: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.

English: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!
Russian: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!

English: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Russian: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.

English: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.
Russian: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.

English: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.
Russian: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.

English: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.
Russian: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.

English: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.
Russian: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.

English: Daily Quests
Russian: Daily Quests

English: Saving Private Leo
Russian: Saving Private Leo

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Russian: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Russian: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Russian: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Russian: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Russian: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Russian: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Russian: Rescue the missing childrens

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Russian: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Russian: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Russian: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Russian: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Russian: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Russian: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Russian: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Russian: Make Monster Shaved Ice

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Russian: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Russian: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Russian: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Russian: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Russian: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Russian: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Russian: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)

English: Coral Island
Russian: Coral Island

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Russian: Clouds Over Coral Island

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Russian: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Russian: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Russian: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Russian: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Russian: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Russian: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Russian: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.

English: Find Your Bearings
Russian: Find Your Bearings

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Russian: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Russian: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Russian: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Russian: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Russian: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Russian: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Russian: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Russian: An Island Shrouded in Mystery

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Russian: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Russian: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Russian: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Russian: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Russian: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Russian: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Russian: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Russian: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.

English: Clear the Paths
Russian: Clear the Paths

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Russian: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Russian: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Russian: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Russian: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Russian: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Russian: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Russian: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Russian: Pirates and Their Pet

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Russian: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Russian: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Russian: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Russian: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Russian: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Russian: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Russian: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Russian: King of the Pirates!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Russian: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Russian: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Russian: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Russian: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Russian: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Russian: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Russian: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Russian: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Russian: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Russian: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Russian: Island Delicacies

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Russian: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Russian: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Russian: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Russian: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Russian: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Russian: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Russian: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.

English: Lizard People
Russian: Lizard People

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Russian: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Russian: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Russian: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Russian: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Russian: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Russian: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Russian: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Russian: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Russian: Mission Improbable

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Russian: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Russian: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Russian: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Russian: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Russian: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Russian: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Russian: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.

English: Surprise Attack!
Russian: Surprise Attack!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Russian: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Russian: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Russian: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Russian: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Russian: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Russian: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Russian: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Russian: Inky Darkness

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Russian: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Russian: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Russian: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Russian: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Russian: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Russian: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Russian: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Russian: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.

English: The Sea King Returns
Russian: The Sea King Returns

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Russian: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Russian: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Russian: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Russian: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Russian: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Russian: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Russian: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Russian: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Russian: Ultimate Crafting

English: Orbs of Power
Russian: Orbs of Power

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Russian: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Russian: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Russian: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Russian: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Russian: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Russian: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.

English: New Hero
Russian: New Hero

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Russian: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Russian: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Russian: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Russian: New Year's Hunt

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Russian: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Russian: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Russian: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Russian: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Russian: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Russian: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Russian: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Russian: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Russian: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Russian: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Russian: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Russian: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Russian: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Russian: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Russian: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Russian: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Russian: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Russian: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Russian: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Russian: Complete all 3 missions.

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Russian: Couple Ring Hunt

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Russian: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Russian: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Russian: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Russian: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Russian: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Russian: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: Roll your dice
Russian: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Russian: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Russian: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Russian: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Russian: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Russian: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Russian: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Russian: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Russian: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Russian: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Russian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Russian: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Russian: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Russian: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Russian: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Russian: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Russian: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Russian: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Russian: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

Russian: Kill Giggleboxes

Russian: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Russian: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Russian: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Russian: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Russian: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Russian: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Russian: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Russian: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Russian: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Russian: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Russian: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Russian: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Russian: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Russian: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Russian: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Russian: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Russian: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Russian: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Russian: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Russian: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Russian: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Russian: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Russian: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Russian: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Russian: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Russian: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Russian: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Russian: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Russian: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Russian: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Russian: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Russian: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Russian: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Russian: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Russian: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Russian: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Russian: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Russian: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Russian: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Russian: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Russian: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Russian: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Russian: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Russian: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Russian: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Russian: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Russian: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Russian: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Russian: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Russian: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Russian: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Russian: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Russian: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Russian: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Russian: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Russian: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Russian: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Russian: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Russian: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Russian: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Russian: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Russian: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Russian: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Russian: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Russian: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Russian: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Russian: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Russian: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Russian: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Russian: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Russian: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Russian: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Russian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Russian: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Russian: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Russian: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Russian: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Russian: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Russian: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Russian: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Russian: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Russian: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Russian: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Russian: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Russian: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Russian: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Russian: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Russian: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Russian: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Russian: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Russian: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Russian: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Russian: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Russian: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Russian: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Russian: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Russian: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos

English: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!
Russian: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!

English: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.
Russian: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.

English: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!
Russian: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!

English: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!
Russian: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!

English: Herneos: The Golden Legacy
Russian: Herneos: The Golden Legacy

English: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!
Russian: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!

English: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!
Russian: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!

English: Check if the treasure is still there
Russian: Check if the treasure is still there

English: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!
Russian: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!

English: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.
Russian: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.

English: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.
Russian: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.

English: Cutting Shade's Power
Russian: Cutting Shade's Power

English: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.
Russian: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos
Russian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos

English: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!
Russian: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!

English: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…
Russian: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…

English: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!
Russian: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!

English: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!
Russian: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!

English: The Final Battle for Herneos
Russian: The Final Battle for Herneos

English: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
Russian: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.

English: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?
Russian: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?

English: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!
Russian: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.
Russian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.

English: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!
Russian: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!

English: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.
Russian: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.

English: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!
Russian: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!

English: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.
Russian: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.

English: Gratitude of the Mayor
Russian: Gratitude of the Mayor

English: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!
Russian: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!

English: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.
Russian: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.

English: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!
Russian: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!

English: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.
Russian: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.

English: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit
Russian: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit

English: Herneos: Ruins of Glory
Russian: Herneos: Ruins of Glory

English: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.
Russian: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.

English: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?
Russian: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?

English: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.
Russian: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.

English: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.
Russian: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.

English: Reporting Back to Sovann
Russian: Reporting Back to Sovann

English: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.
Russian: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.

English: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!
Russian: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!

English: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.
Russian: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.

English: Return to Dr. Estly
Russian: Return to Dr. Estly

English: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!
Russian: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!

English: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!
Russian: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!

English: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.
Russian: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.

English: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.
Russian: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.

English: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)
Russian: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)

English: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!
Russian: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!

English: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!
Russian: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!

English: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!
Russian: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!

English: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!
Russian: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!

English: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.
Russian: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.

English: Christmas Invasion 1
Russian: Christmas Invasion 1

English: Christmas Invasion 2
Russian: Christmas Invasion 2

English: Christmas Invasion 3
Russian: Christmas Invasion 3

English: Year of the Snake 2025
