English: It’s alright. You’ve already done a lot. But if you ever change your mind, please come back.
Russian: It’s alright. You’ve already done a lot. But if you ever change your mind, please come back.

English: There’s really nothing else? Ah…
Russian: There’s really nothing else? Ah…

English: This handwriting… it’s definitely my father’s. Thank you so much. It looks like he tried to write in code. I need to decode it right away.
Russian: This handwriting… it’s definitely my father’s. Thank you so much. It looks like he tried to write in code. I need to decode it right away.

English: Obtain “???’s Diary”
Russian: Obtain “???’s Diary”

English: To the Jarl
Russian: To the Jarl

English: So, you’re that adventurer. Thanks to you, the village is finally settling down. Because of that—or maybe because he suddenly has time—the jarl wants to meet you. I’ll put in a good word, so go see him when you can.
Russian: So, you’re that adventurer. Thanks to you, the village is finally settling down. Because of that—or maybe because he suddenly has time—the jarl wants to meet you. I’ll put in a good word, so go see him when you can.

English: If your people want to form ties with our village, you’ll need his approval anyway.
Russian: If your people want to form ties with our village, you’ll need his approval anyway.

English: Well then, come back when you’re free.
Russian: Well then, come back when you’re free.

English: You still haven’t gone? He may be an old man with little to do, but you should probably hurry.
Russian: You still haven’t gone? He may be an old man with little to do, but you should probably hurry.

English: So, you’re the adventurer I’ve heard so much about.
Russian: So, you’re the adventurer I’ve heard so much about.

English: Obtain “???’s Serial Diary”
Russian: Obtain “???’s Serial Diary”

English: Prelude to the Counterattack
Russian: Prelude to the Counterattack

English: Thanks to you, we were finally able to breathe. And those Lycans… they never imagined an adventurer would appear, so now they’re on the back foot. This is our chance. Will you help us?
Russian: Thanks to you, we were finally able to breathe. And those Lycans… they never imagined an adventurer would appear, so now they’re on the back foot. This is our chance. Will you help us?

English: Before we start a full-scale battle, I need you to deal with the Kanonicus.
Russian: Before we start a full-scale battle, I need you to deal with the Kanonicus.

English: I have to admit, your strength is impressive. We can’t afford to let you go just yet.
Russian: I have to admit, your strength is impressive. We can’t afford to let you go just yet.

English: The enemy’s gathering point is here.
Russian: The enemy’s gathering point is here.

English: Hahaha! The war against the Lycans is ours to win now. We owe you a great deal.
Russian: Hahaha! The war against the Lycans is ours to win now. We owe you a great deal.

English: Kill 40 Kanonicus
Russian: Kill 40 Kanonicus

English: Pursuit
Russian: Pursuit

English: Thanks to your work, we launched a surprise attack and sent them running. We even found some who couldn’t keep up. Would you finish them off and send them to their gods?
Russian: Thanks to your work, we launched a surprise attack and sent them running. We even found some who couldn’t keep up. Would you finish them off and send them to their gods?

English: We’re moving to chase down the main force.
Russian: We’re moving to chase down the main force.

English: But we don’t have spare troops to deal with the stragglers.
Russian: But we don’t have spare troops to deal with the stragglers.

English: Perfect. We’ll leave them to you and continue the pursuit.
Russian: Perfect. We’ll leave them to you and continue the pursuit.

English: Oh, you did it?
Russian: Oh, you did it?

English: Kill 10 Captain Kanonicus
Russian: Kill 10 Captain Kanonicus

English: Mission Failed
Russian: Mission Failed

English: It’s embarrassing to admit, but… unlike you, we failed. We tried to trap them in a tight spot and wipe them out, but a mage suddenly appeared. Those beasts shouldn’t be capable of magic.
Russian: It’s embarrassing to admit, but… unlike you, we failed. We tried to trap them in a tight spot and wipe them out, but a mage suddenly appeared. Those beasts shouldn’t be capable of magic.

English: We need to regroup our forces, so… could you handle them in our place?
Russian: We need to regroup our forces, so… could you handle them in our place?

English: I understand. If you change your mind, please come back.
Russian: I understand. If you change your mind, please come back.

English: Thank you. We’ll wait for good news.
Russian: Thank you. We’ll wait for good news.

English: Excellent work.
Russian: Excellent work.

English: Kill 30 Small Mage Redclouds
Russian: Kill 30 Small Mage Redclouds

English: Back to Town
Russian: Back to Town

English: The Lycans resisted fiercely, so the jarl has returned to town for now.
Russian: The Lycans resisted fiercely, so the jarl has returned to town for now.

English: Let’s go back as well. I was ordered to wait here and report to you when you returned.
Russian: Let’s go back as well. I was ordered to wait here and report to you when you returned.

English: If you have other business, feel free to handle it first. Nothing around here is a real threat to you anymore.
Russian: If you have other business, feel free to handle it first. Nothing around here is a real threat to you anymore.

English: The jarl? He’s probably back at the town quarters.
Russian: The jarl? He’s probably back at the town quarters.

English: I can’t thank you enough for everything.
Russian: I can’t thank you enough for everything.

English: Meet with the Jarl
Russian: Meet with the Jarl

English: Covering Fire
Russian: Covering Fire

English: I know you just got back, but could I ask a favor? An elder leading our retreat requested reinforcements. Can you go help them escape safely?
Russian: I know you just got back, but could I ask a favor? An elder leading our retreat requested reinforcements. Can you go help them escape safely?

English: That’s a relief. Thank you.
Russian: That’s a relief. Thank you.

English: It won’t be easy, but you’re the only one I can send. It’s troubling.
Russian: It won’t be easy, but you’re the only one I can send. It’s troubling.

English: The elder should be waiting for you there.
Russian: The elder should be waiting for you there.

English: Who’s there? Come out and identify yourself!
Russian: Who’s there? Come out and identify yourself!

English: Meet with [Elder] Silar
Russian: Meet with [Elder] Silar

English: Conflicted Orders
Russian: Conflicted Orders

English: Ah, you must be the adventurer. What brings you here? Reinforcements? I never sent such a request. Who told you that?
Russian: Ah, you must be the adventurer. What brings you here? Reinforcements? I never sent such a request. Who told you that?

English: (Wolf howls) What was that? Is someone out there?
Russian: (Wolf howls) What was that? Is someone out there?

English: What is that man thinking…? He’s always been suspicious.
Russian: What is that man thinking…? He’s always been suspicious.

English: Why aren’t you checking the situation outside? What’s going on?
Russian: Why aren’t you checking the situation outside? What’s going on?

English: No, outside…! A whole group of Lycan mages appeared out of nowhere.
Russian: No, outside…! A whole group of Lycan mages appeared out of nowhere.

English: Meet with [Eillun Guard] Dreon
Russian: Meet with [Eillun Guard] Dreon

English: Chaos
Russian: Chaos

English: We’ve been covering our tracks while retreating. There’s no way the Lycans should’ve found us. We’ll hold as long as we can. Please, report our situation to the elder.
Russian: We’ve been covering our tracks while retreating. There’s no way the Lycans should’ve found us. We’ll hold as long as we can. Please, report our situation to the elder.

English: Grr… Huh… Please hurry!
Russian: Grr… Huh… Please hurry!

English: Please! We can’t last much longer alone.
Russian: Please! We can’t last much longer alone.

English: We won’t hold out for long.
Russian: We won’t hold out for long.

English: The Lycans… are they swarming again?
Russian: The Lycans… are they swarming again?

English: Trap
Russian: Trap

English: Something has gone terribly wrong. We’ve clearly walked into a trap. The jarl may be shady, but he wouldn’t abandon his own people… or would he? Where did the information leak?
Russian: Something has gone terribly wrong. We’ve clearly walked into a trap. The jarl may be shady, but he wouldn’t abandon his own people… or would he? Where did the information leak?

English: For now, we need to deal with the enemies in front of us. Can I count on you?
Russian: For now, we need to deal with the enemies in front of us. Can I count on you?

English: Thank you. We’ll talk more after this is over.
Russian: Thank you. We’ll talk more after this is over.

English: Hmph… but we don’t really have another choice.
Russian: Hmph… but we don’t really have another choice.

English: If you take down a few, the rest will fall apart. Their patterns are predictable.
Russian: If you take down a few, the rest will fall apart. Their patterns are predictable.

English: Kill 20 Mage Redclouds
Russian: Kill 20 Mage Redclouds

English: Again, the Town
Russian: Again, the Town

English: Thinking about it… those Lycans are mages. They might have tracked us with some kind of magic. Or… maybe the jarl really did abandon us.
Russian: Thinking about it… those Lycans are mages. They might have tracked us with some kind of magic. Or… maybe the jarl really did abandon us.

English: One of our scouts reported a pack of Lycans heading toward the village. Please go help defend it.
Russian: One of our scouts reported a pack of Lycans heading toward the village. Please go help defend it.

English: I’m glad you’ve come.
Russian: I’m glad you’ve come.

English: We might not have much time left.
Russian: We might not have much time left.

English: I’ll follow as soon as I can.
Russian: I’ll follow as soon as I can.

English: You arrived just in time. Without you, the village would have been in serious danger.
Russian: You arrived just in time. Without you, the village would have been in serious danger.

English: Kill 20 Captain Mage Redclouds
Russian: Kill 20 Captain Mage Redclouds

English: Reunion 1
Russian: Reunion 1

English: If we’d tried to hold them off from inside, they probably would’ve broken through. With their forces this weakened, they shouldn’t have many left.
Russian: If we’d tried to hold them off from inside, they probably would’ve broken through. With their forces this weakened, they shouldn’t have many left.

English: Once things calm down, we’re planning a counterattack. Would you help us again? Oh, and before that, some villagers have been looking for you. They want to thank you personally.
Russian: Once things calm down, we’re planning a counterattack. Would you help us again? Oh, and before that, some villagers have been looking for you. They want to thank you personally.

English: Why don’t you visit [Eillun Guard] Gard first? I heard you helped him a lot—and he might be preparing something big for you.
Russian: Why don’t you visit [Eillun Guard] Gard first? I heard you helped him a lot—and he might be preparing something big for you.

English: You’ve done more than enough, so don’t feel pressured.
Russian: You’ve done more than enough, so don’t feel pressured.

English: Have you met them yet? Even I don’t know what they’ve prepared for you.
Russian: Have you met them yet? Even I don’t know what they’ve prepared for you.

English: You’ve worked incredibly hard. Every battle was tough, but I’m sure you’ll bring us victory again. This isn’t much, but please accept it.
Russian: You’ve worked incredibly hard. Every battle was tough, but I’m sure you’ll bring us victory again. This isn’t much, but please accept it.

English: Meet with [Eillun Guard] Gard
Russian: Meet with [Eillun Guard] Gard

English: Reunion 2
Russian: Reunion 2

English: Did you enjoy meeting [Eillun Guard] Gard? I wonder who’s waiting for you next.
Russian: Did you enjoy meeting [Eillun Guard] Gard? I wonder who’s waiting for you next.

English: This time it’s Kaela. I don’t know exactly what she’s planning, but I’d say you’re in for something interesting.
Russian: This time it’s Kaela. I don’t know exactly what she’s planning, but I’d say you’re in for something interesting.

English: No need to rush—take your time.
Russian: No need to rush—take your time.

English: Have you met her yet? Honestly, I have no idea what she’s up to.
Russian: Have you met her yet? Honestly, I have no idea what she’s up to.

English: Ugh, I’ve stopped causing trouble for Mom and Dad, so stop looking at me like that.
Russian: Ugh, I’ve stopped causing trouble for Mom and Dad, so stop looking at me like that.

English: Reunion 3
Russian: Reunion 3

English: Hope you had fun with Kaela. Who do you think is next?
Russian: Hope you had fun with Kaela. Who do you think is next?

English: Now it’s Livia’s turn. I’m not sure what she has planned either, but I’m sure it’ll be something special.
Russian: Now it’s Livia’s turn. I’m not sure what she has planned either, but I’m sure it’ll be something special.

English: There’s no hurry. Go when you’re ready.
Russian: There’s no hurry. Go when you’re ready.

English: Have you met her yet? I really have no idea what’s coming next.
Russian: Have you met her yet? I really have no idea what’s coming next.

English: So in the end, that turned out to be something completely different… In any case, I can only imagine how much you’ve endured for us, even though we aren’t of the same kind. This is just a small token of our gratitude. Please accept it.
Russian: So in the end, that turned out to be something completely different… In any case, I can only imagine how much you’ve endured for us, even though we aren’t of the same kind. This is just a small token of our gratitude. Please accept it.

English: Meet with Livia
Russian: Meet with Livia

English: Reunion 4
Russian: Reunion 4

English: Well, I think this will be your final visitor. Any guesses who?
Russian: Well, I think this will be your final visitor. Any guesses who?

English: Taila is next. Whatever happens, I have a feeling it will be something meaningful.
Russian: Taila is next. Whatever happens, I have a feeling it will be something meaningful.

English: Don’t feel pressured. Go at your own pace.
Russian: Don’t feel pressured. Go at your own pace.

English: Did you meet her? I still don’t know what she’s planning.
Russian: Did you meet her? I still don’t know what she’s planning.

English: Thanks to you, adventurer, I found my parents’ hidden will. My father exposed the jarl’s crimes, and my grandfather had him killed. Branded a traitor, he was nearly murdered. Please avenge them. Take this, and let it fuel your revenge.
Russian: Thanks to you, adventurer, I found my parents’ hidden will. My father exposed the jarl’s crimes, and my grandfather had him killed. Branded a traitor, he was nearly murdered. Please avenge them. Take this, and let it fuel your revenge.

English: Meet with Taila
Russian: Meet with Taila

English: Chapter 5 The Final Chapter
Russian: Chapter 5 The Final Chapter

English: This Is Nothing
Russian: This Is Nothing

English: So, you’ve met everyone now? The Lycans are moving faster than we expected. I thought they’d need more time to regroup, but they’re already organizing their forces.
Russian: So, you’ve met everyone now? The Lycans are moving faster than we expected. I thought they’d need more time to regroup, but they’re already organizing their forces.

English: If we let them gather any more, things will become much harder. Could you go ahead and disrupt their plans?
Russian: If we let them gather any more, things will become much harder. Could you go ahead and disrupt their plans?

English: Thank you. I couldn’t ask for a more reliable ally.
Russian: Thank you. I couldn’t ask for a more reliable ally.

English: If we hesitate, everything we’ve built could collapse. I’m counting on you.
Russian: If we hesitate, everything we’ve built could collapse. I’m counting on you.

English: Here’s where we expect them to be.
Russian: Here’s where we expect them to be.

English: You’ve done wonderfully.
Russian: You’ve done wonderfully.

English: Kill 30 Small Taiahas
Russian: Kill 30 Small Taiahas

English: Toward the Final Battle
Russian: Toward the Final Battle

English: Leave the rest to us.
Russian: Leave the rest to us.

English: Elder Ayr is urgently looking for you, so you should go see him.
Russian: Elder Ayr is urgently looking for you, so you should go see him.

English: We can clean up what’s left on our own.
Russian: We can clean up what’s left on our own.

English: I didn’t catch all the details, but it sounded important.
Russian: I didn’t catch all the details, but it sounded important.

English: Welcome back, adventurer.
Russian: Welcome back, adventurer.

English: Meet with [Elder] Ayr
Russian: Meet with [Elder] Ayr

English: Counterattack
Russian: Ливень стрел

English: I heard from [Captain] Baron that your ambush went well. Thanks to you, the enemy is completely confused. We can’t waste this chance. We’ll launch a diversion. In the meantime, can you handle the Taiaha?
Russian: I heard from [Captain] Baron that your ambush went well. Thanks to you, the enemy is completely confused. We can’t waste this chance. We’ll launch a diversion. In the meantime, can you handle the Taiaha?

English: That’s reassuring.
Russian: That’s reassuring.

English: Hmm. Do you have a different suggestion?
Russian: Hmm. Do you have a different suggestion?

English: Good. I’ll be waiting for more good news.
Russian: Good. I’ll be waiting for more good news.

English: Excellent work.
Russian: Excellent work.

English: Kill 30 Taiahas
Russian: Kill 30 Taiahas

English: Traitor
Russian: Traitor

English: Our operation was a success as well, but… some soldiers say they saw the jarl in the enemy’s camp, retreating with them. Now their morale is shaken.
Russian: Our operation was a success as well, but… some soldiers say they saw the jarl in the enemy’s camp, retreating with them. Now their morale is shaken.

English: I knew he was scheming, but to see him betray his own people… This will be our next move.
Russian: I knew he was scheming, but to see him betray his own people… This will be our next move.

English: The soldiers will never fight at full strength while that traitor is free. You must track him down. There will be Lycans along his escape route, including Captain Taiaha, but I doubt they’ll be a problem for you.
Russian: The soldiers will never fight at full strength while that traitor is free. You must track him down. There will be Lycans along his escape route, including Captain Taiaha, but I doubt they’ll be a problem for you.

English: Hmm… I may have to send the soldiers instead. If you change your mind, come back.
Russian: Hmm… I may have to send the soldiers instead. If you change your mind, come back.

English: I’m counting on you. I trust you with this mission.
Russian: I’m counting on you. I trust you with this mission.

English: Thank you for your efforts, sir. I’m Merk, a scout ordered to track the traitor by the Elder.
Russian: Thank you for your efforts, sir. I’m Merk, a scout ordered to track the traitor by the Elder.

English: Meet with [Eillun Scout] Merk
Russian: Meet with [Eillun Scout] Merk

English: Bad News
Russian: Bad News

English: The Lycan forces keep growing, and their numbers make it hard to get close. I… lost sight of the target. This area is under Chief Keokuk’s direct control, so getting any closer is almost impossible.
Russian: The Lycan forces keep growing, and their numbers make it hard to get close. I… lost sight of the target. This area is under Chief Keokuk’s direct control, so getting any closer is almost impossible.

English: The fact that the traitor went this far suggests they’re more closely allied than we thought. In any case, we’ll have to defeat this enemy to uncover any proof.
Russian: The fact that the traitor went this far suggests they’re more closely allied than we thought. In any case, we’ll have to defeat this enemy to uncover any proof.

English: Thank you. Once you secure evidence, I think you should return to the Elder.
Russian: Thank you. Once you secure evidence, I think you should return to the Elder.

English: This is the best plan I can think of. Do you have a better one?
Russian: This is the best plan I can think of. Do you have a better one?

English: I’ll be waiting.
Russian: I’ll be waiting.

English: Aside from the jarl, this war is finally over. With that stinking giant defeated, the fighting is truly finished. It took far too long. Thank you for bringing this war to an end.
Russian: Aside from the jarl, this war is finally over. With that stinking giant defeated, the fighting is truly finished. It took far too long. Thank you for bringing this war to an end.

English: Kill 1 Chief Keokuk and obtain “Chief Keokuk’s Notebook”
Russian: Kill 1 Chief Keokuk and obtain “Chief Keokuk’s Notebook”

English: The Ever-Turning Vicious Cycle of Blood
Russian: The Ever-Turning Vicious Cycle of Blood

English: Chief Keokuk had this? What madness. So this war was just a game played by him and the traitor…
Russian: Chief Keokuk had this? What madness. So this war was just a game played by him and the traitor…

English: The Lycans worship the demon Ankou as their god. The traitor must have made a deal, selling us out to fuel this war. To fully summon a demon, a great amount of blood is required.
Russian: The Lycans worship the demon Ankou as their god. The traitor must have made a deal, selling us out to fuel this war. To fully summon a demon, a great amount of blood is required.

English: According to the note you brought, they’ve already attempted the summoning, but it’s incomplete. Their final goal must be to complete that abomination.
Russian: According to the note you brought, they’ve already attempted the summoning, but it’s incomplete. Their final goal must be to complete that abomination.

English: At the edge of the continent lies Ankou’s sealed asylum. If the traitor is there, it’s up to you whether to kill him or bring him back. Please, put an end to this insanity.
Russian: At the edge of the continent lies Ankou’s sealed asylum. If the traitor is there, it’s up to you whether to kill him or bring him back. Please, put an end to this insanity.

English: You are a hero of Muran. You must finish this. If this continues, the whole continent will be soaked in blood.
Russian: You are a hero of Muran. You must finish this. If this continues, the whole continent will be soaked in blood.

English: You’ve already done so much, but if I may, I’d like to ask you once more.
Russian: You’ve already done so much, but if I may, I’d like to ask you once more.

English: I pray this ends without more tragedy.
Russian: I pray this ends without more tragedy.

English: So… you’ve come all the way here.
Russian: So… you’ve come all the way here.

English: Go to Ankou’s Asylum
Russian: Go to Ankou’s Asylum

English: Climax
Russian: Climax

English: Do I look pathetic to you? A traitor, betrayed and left to die… What would an outsider like you understand? Do you have any idea how much torment I’ve endured to get this far? No, explaining is pointless. In the end, we all meet the same fate.
Russian: Do I look pathetic to you? A traitor, betrayed and left to die… What would an outsider like you understand? Do you have any idea how much torment I’ve endured to get this far? No, explaining is pointless. In the end, we all meet the same fate.

English: Go on. Ankou will give you peace. My granddaughter wanted revenge? Ha. I lost my wife long ago and never had a child—how could I have a granddaughter? Kuhuhu… so even you… (dies)
Russian: Go on. Ankou will give you peace. My granddaughter wanted revenge? Ha. I lost my wife long ago and never had a child—how could I have a granddaughter? Kuhuhu… so even you… (dies)

English: What’s wrong? Are you afraid now that you have to face a demon? It’s too late for that.
Russian: What’s wrong? Are you afraid now that you have to face a demon? It’s too late for that.

English: (He’s dead.)
Russian: (He’s dead.)

English: What happened? Is Ankou defeated? The handwriting on this page… so the traitor is gone as well.
Russian: What happened? Is Ankou defeated? The handwriting on this page… so the traitor is gone as well.

English: Defeat Ankou and obtain “Jarl’s Diary”
Russian: Defeat Ankou and obtain “Jarl’s Diary”

English: Peace at Last?
Russian: Peace at Last?

English: Incredible. It may not have been a fully summoned demon, but you still defeated it. The jarl had a family? He lost his wife ages ago and never had any children.
Russian: Incredible. It may not have been a fully summoned demon, but you still defeated it. The jarl had a family? He lost his wife ages ago and never had any children.

English: Whatever the truth, you’ve saved this land from the demon and those filthy beasts. You have my deepest thanks. Trade with your continent? Of course. I fully support it. I’ll guarantee free passage for anyone coming to our village. Take this approval token.
Russian: Whatever the truth, you’ve saved this land from the demon and those filthy beasts. You have my deepest thanks. Trade with your continent? Of course. I fully support it. I’ll guarantee free passage for anyone coming to our village. Take this approval token.

English: I’m looking forward to it. I wonder what kind of heroes will come next.
Russian: I’m looking forward to it. I wonder what kind of heroes will come next.

English: Still, some formalities must be followed, don’t you think?
Russian: Still, some formalities must be followed, don’t you think?

English: Haha. You’re free to use the village facilities whenever you like.
Russian: Haha. You’re free to use the village facilities whenever you like.

English: It’s been a while. How goes your exploration of the New Continent? You’ve really been through a lot. You didn’t just chart new lands—you saved an entire town and secured official permission for trade. I’ll see that you’re properly rewarded. Well done.
Russian: It’s been a while. How goes your exploration of the New Continent? You’ve really been through a lot. You didn’t just chart new lands—you saved an entire town and secured official permission for trade. I’ll see that you’re properly rewarded. Well done.

English: New Beginning
Russian: New Beginning

English: So, how was the New Continent? And this… what is it? Hmm… a document I’ve never seen before. This alone isn’t enough to understand it. Could you find more of these?
Russian: So, how was the New Continent? And this… what is it? Hmm… a document I’ve never seen before. This alone isn’t enough to understand it. Could you find more of these?

English: From the look of it, I’d say there are at least three more. We’ll need all of them to figure it out.
Russian: From the look of it, I’d say there are at least three more. We’ll need all of them to figure it out.

English: Sigh… I suppose there’s no other choice.
Russian: Sigh… I suppose there’s no other choice.

English: He should still be there.
Russian: He should still be there.

English: Hmm…
Russian: Hmm…

English: Obtain 4 different “Torn Scrolls”
Russian: Obtain 4 different “Torn Scrolls”

English: Lost in the Fog
Russian: Lost in the Fog

English: I thought I could decipher it, but there are unknown characters mixed in. I’ve heard rumors of someone who might understand this sort of thing. Would you be willing to find him?
Russian: I thought I could decipher it, but there are unknown characters mixed in. I’ve heard rumors of someone who might understand this sort of thing. Would you be willing to find him?

English: There’s a large island near Flarine. He should be somewhere around there.
Russian: There’s a large island near Flarine. He should be somewhere around there.

English: Unfortunately, I can’t think of any better option.
Russian: Unfortunately, I can’t think of any better option.

English: I don’t know the exact location myself—just what I’ve heard.
Russian: I don’t know the exact location myself—just what I’ve heard.

English: It’s been a while. What brings you here? You found this in Kaillun? I’m Muran as well, though I left my tribe long ago. I can’t say much, but will you hand that over? It’s about summoning a god and speeding up the tower’s completion. Take this as thanks.
Russian: It’s been a while. What brings you here? You found this in Kaillun? I’m Muran as well, though I left my tribe long ago. I can’t say much, but will you hand that over? It’s about summoning a god and speeding up the tower’s completion. Take this as thanks.

English: Meet with “[Mysterious] ???”
Russian: Meet with “[Mysterious] ???”

English: Kaillun Daily Quests
Russian: Kaillun Daily Quests

English: Lost your chain again?
Russian: Lost your chain again?

English: Could you help me, sir? That thing stole my belongings again. I’ll be punished if I don’t get my serial number chain back. Please help me.
Russian: Could you help me, sir? That thing stole my belongings again. I’ll be punished if I don’t get my serial number chain back. Please help me.

English: Oh gods, thank you.
Russian: Oh gods, thank you.

English: Think of it as helping the dead, just this once… Please, I beg you.
Russian: Think of it as helping the dead, just this once… Please, I beg you.

English: Have you retrieved it yet? Ah, not yet, I see.
Russian: Have you retrieved it yet? Ah, not yet, I see.

English: I can’t thank you enough.
Russian: I can’t thank you enough.

English: Kill 50 Small Hundur Sharpfoots and obtain 1 Abandoned Serial Number Chain
Russian: Kill 50 Small Hundur Sharpfoots and obtain 1 Abandoned Serial Number Chain

English: Clearing the Area
Russian: Clearing the Area

English: There are so many Captain Kyouchish around that I can’t rest in peace. Could you take care of them?
Russian: There are so many Captain Kyouchish around that I can’t rest in peace. Could you take care of them?

English: Thank you. I heard their howls coming from that way.
Russian: Thank you. I heard their howls coming from that way.

English: You’re the only one I can rely on.
Russian: You’re the only one I can rely on.

English: I’m counting on you, sir.
Russian: I’m counting on you, sir.

English: Now I can finally rest easy until the next ship arrives. Thank you.
Russian: Now I can finally rest easy until the next ship arrives. Thank you.

English: Kill 30 Captain Kyouchish
Russian: Kill 30 Captain Kyouchish

English: Honor of a Warrior 1
Russian: Honor of a Warrior 1

English: If you call yourself a warrior of Kaillun, taking down Hundur Sharpfoots is just a warm-up. Want to prove yourself?
Russian: If you call yourself a warrior of Kaillun, taking down Hundur Sharpfoots is just a warm-up. Want to prove yourself?

English: Alright, then. Take care of those beasts and come back.
Russian: Alright, then. Take care of those beasts and come back.

English: If it’s too much, don’t push yourself. Cleaning up reckless fools is more work than it’s worth.
Russian: If it’s too much, don’t push yourself. Cleaning up reckless fools is more work than it’s worth.

English: Good. This shouldn’t take you long.
Russian: Good. This shouldn’t take you long.

English: Great job. Now I can truly call you a warrior.
Russian: Great job. Now I can truly call you a warrior.

English: Kill 50 Hundur Sharpfoots
Russian: Kill 50 Hundur Sharpfoots

English: Honor of a Warrior 2
Russian: Honor of a Warrior 2

English: For a seasoned warrior, the real challenge is Captain Hundur Sharpfoot. Think you’re ready?
Russian: For a seasoned warrior, the real challenge is Captain Hundur Sharpfoot. Think you’re ready?

English: You already know how this works. No need for me to explain.
Russian: You already know how this works. No need for me to explain.

English: If you’re busy, that’s fine. The challenge isn’t going anywhere.
Russian: If you’re busy, that’s fine. The challenge isn’t going anywhere.

English: I’ll be looking forward to seeing what you can do.
Russian: I’ll be looking forward to seeing what you can do.

English: I knew I judged you correctly. From now on, you’re an elite warrior of our village.
Russian: I knew I judged you correctly. From now on, you’re an elite warrior of our village.

English: Kill 30 Captain Hundur Sharpfoots
Russian: Kill 30 Captain Hundur Sharpfoots

English: Guard’s Request 1
Russian: Guard’s Request 1

English: Small Samosets are pests that constantly bother our guards. Can you handle them and lighten our workload?
Russian: Small Samosets are pests that constantly bother our guards. Can you handle them and lighten our workload?

English: Thank you. You know where they are, right?
Russian: Thank you. You know where they are, right?

English: If you’re busy, we’ll figure something out on our own.
Russian: If you’re busy, we’ll figure something out on our own.

English: For someone like you, this should be nothing.
Russian: For someone like you, this should be nothing.

English: I knew you were the right one to ask. Our work just got much easier thanks to you. I really appreciate it.
Russian: I knew you were the right one to ask. Our work just got much easier thanks to you. I really appreciate it.

English: Kill 50 Small Samosets
Russian: Kill 50 Small Samosets

English: Guard’s Request 2
Russian: Guard’s Request 2

English: Samosets have been swarming the grasslands lately, making patrols difficult. Could you thin them out a bit?
Russian: Samosets have been swarming the grasslands lately, making patrols difficult. Could you thin them out a bit?

English: Thank you. You know where to find them, don’t you?
Russian: Thank you. You know where to find them, don’t you?

English: If you’ve got other priorities, we understand. We’ll manage.
Russian: If you’ve got other priorities, we understand. We’ll manage.

English: This should be an easy job for you.
Russian: This should be an easy job for you.

English: I knew I could rely on you. You’ve made our work much easier. Truly, thank you.
Russian: I knew I could rely on you. You’ve made our work much easier. Truly, thank you.

English: Kill 50 Samosets
Russian: Kill 50 Samosets

English: Guard’s Request 3
Russian: Guard’s Request 3

English: Those Captain Samosets keep slipping into the forest. Could you clear some of them out?
Russian: Those Captain Samosets keep slipping into the forest. Could you clear some of them out?

English: We’re grateful for your help. You know the area well enough to track them, right?
Russian: We’re grateful for your help. You know the area well enough to track them, right?

English: If you don’t have time, we’ll deal with it somehow.
Russian: If you don’t have time, we’ll deal with it somehow.

English: This should be a simple task for you.
Russian: This should be a simple task for you.

English: I knew I could count on you. You’ve helped us a lot. Thanks.
Russian: I knew I could count on you. You’ve helped us a lot. Thanks.

English: Kill 30 Captain Samosets
Russian: Kill 30 Captain Samosets

English: Guard’s Request 4
Russian: Guard’s Request 4

English: Small Kyouchish are getting out of control and causing trouble. We could really use your help cutting their numbers.
Russian: Small Kyouchish are getting out of control and causing trouble. We could really use your help cutting their numbers.

English: I appreciate it. You won’t have any trouble finding them, right?
Russian: I appreciate it. You won’t have any trouble finding them, right?

English: If you’re busy with something else, don’t worry. We’ll handle it.
Russian: If you’re busy with something else, don’t worry. We’ll handle it.

English: This should be no challenge for you.
Russian: This should be no challenge for you.

English: I was right to trust you. You’ve made our job much easier. Thank you.
Russian: I was right to trust you. You’ve made our job much easier. Thank you.

English: Kill 50 Small Kyouchish
Russian: Kill 50 Small Kyouchish

English: Guard’s Request 5
Russian: Guard’s Request 5

English: Our guards are worn down dealing with Kyouchish. If you could defeat a few, it’d be a huge help.
Russian: Our guards are worn down dealing with Kyouchish. If you could defeat a few, it’d be a huge help.

English: Thank you. You know how to find them, right?
Russian: Thank you. You know how to find them, right?

English: If you’ve got other plans, it’s alright. We’ll make do.
Russian: If you’ve got other plans, it’s alright. We’ll make do.

English: This should be simple work for someone of your skill.
Russian: This should be simple work for someone of your skill.

English: I knew you’d handle it. You’ve made our lives much easier. Truly, thank you.
Russian: I knew you’d handle it. You’ve made our lives much easier. Truly, thank you.

English: Kill 50 Kyouchish
Russian: Kill 50 Kyouchish

English: Elder’s Request 1
Russian: Elder’s Request 1

English: It looks like a group of Small Kanonicus are swarming somewhere in the forest. I’ve received complaints from the townsfolk. Could you lend a hand?
Russian: It looks like a group of Small Kanonicus are swarming somewhere in the forest. I’ve received complaints from the townsfolk. Could you lend a hand?

English: As always, thank you.
Russian: As always, thank you.

English: If you have other things to do, I’ll have to send a guard instead.
Russian: If you have other things to do, I’ll have to send a guard instead.

English: You know where it is, don’t you?
Russian: You know where it is, don’t you?

English: You did a great job. Now I can finally tell everyone they’re safe.
Russian: You did a great job. Now I can finally tell everyone they’re safe.

English: Kill 50 Small Kanonicus
Russian: Kill 50 Small Kanonicus

English: Elder’s Request 2
Russian: Elder’s Request 2

English: I don’t know why, but after you dealt with the small Kanonicus group, their main numbers started increasing. Could you help with this as well?
Russian: I don’t know why, but after you dealt with the small Kanonicus group, their main numbers started increasing. Could you help with this as well?

English: I can’t thank you enough for your help.
Russian: I can’t thank you enough for your help.

English: If you’re busy, I understand. We’ll manage somehow.
Russian: If you’re busy, I understand. We’ll manage somehow.

English: I believe in you. Good luck.
Russian: I believe in you. Good luck.

English: For now, we can finally enjoy a bit of peace. Well done, truly.
Russian: For now, we can finally enjoy a bit of peace. Well done, truly.

English: Kill 50 Kanonicus
Russian: Kill 50 Kanonicus

English: To Awakening
Russian: To Awakening

English: Find the Old Document
Russian: Find the Old Document

English: Leave This to the Experts
Russian: Leave This to the Experts

English: Let’s Find the Real Clue
Russian: Let’s Find the Real Clue

English: It Will Be Different This Time
Russian: It Will Be Different This Time

English: The Gateway to Awakening
Russian: The Gateway to Awakening

English: The New Beginning
Russian: The New Beginning

English: Welcome, adventurer. I can sense great power within you.
Russian: Welcome, adventurer. I can sense great power within you.

English: Oh ho… this is interesting. It seems your experiences are finally paying off.
Russian: Oh ho… this is interesting. It seems your experiences are finally paying off.

English: That power is the foundation of awakening as a transcendent being.
Russian: That power is the foundation of awakening as a transcendent being.

English: Anyone can possess it, but few ever reach that realm.
Russian: Anyone can possess it, but few ever reach that realm.

English: I cannot guide you directly, but I know those who can.
Russian: I cannot guide you directly, but I know those who can.

English: Good. First, meet [Mercenary Master] Andy.
Russian: Good. First, meet [Mercenary Master] Andy.

English: Good. First, meet [Magician Master] Hee.
Russian: Good. First, meet [Magician Master] Hee.

English: Good. First, meet [Acrobat Master] Pyre.
Russian: Good. First, meet [Acrobat Master] Pyre.

English: Good. First, meet [Assist Master] Maki.
Russian: Good. First, meet [Assist Master] Maki.

English: This is the first step toward something much greater. Why hesitate? If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Russian: This is the first step toward something much greater. Why hesitate? If you change your mind, you know where to find me.

English: You still haven’t gone to see him? He’s probably waiting impatiently.
Russian: You still haven’t gone to see him? He’s probably waiting impatiently.

English: You still haven’t gone to see her? She’s probably waiting impatiently.
Russian: You still haven’t gone to see her? She’s probably waiting impatiently.

English: Long time no see, adventurer.
Russian: Long time no see, adventurer.

English: Meet [Mercenary Master] Andy.
Russian: Meet [Mercenary Master] Andy.

English: Meet [Magician Master] Hee.
Russian: Meet [Magician Master] Hee.

English: Meet [Acrobat Master] Pyre.
Russian: Meet [Acrobat Master] Pyre.

English: Meet [Assist Master] Maki.
Russian: Meet [Assist Master] Maki.

English: Yes, I heard everything from Radyon.
Russian: Yes, I heard everything from Radyon.

English: Awakening, huh… from what I can see, you’re already more than ready.
Russian: Awakening, huh… from what I can see, you’re already more than ready.

English: If the right opportunity comes, you might be able to awaken.
Russian: If the right opportunity comes, you might be able to awaken.

English: A new area was discovered deep beneath the seas of Coral Island. Adventurers are flocking there, hoping for new discoveries.
Russian: A new area was discovered deep beneath the seas of Coral Island. Adventurers are flocking there, hoping for new discoveries.

English: Why not dive in? You might find something unique and awaken your true potential.
Russian: Why not dive in? You might find something unique and awaken your true potential.

English: I thought this would be a good chance for you, but so be it. If you change your mind, come back anytime.
Russian: I thought this would be a good chance for you, but so be it. If you change your mind, come back anytime.

English: You should hurry. If others get there first, there might be nothing left to find.
Russian: You should hurry. If others get there first, there might be nothing left to find.

English: It seems you couldn’t awaken this time, but you still did well. Did you find anything?
Russian: It seems you couldn’t awaken this time, but you still did well. Did you find anything?

English: Find a “Stale Record” from Herneos. People say they’ve seen them near the Small Dorians.
Russian: Find a “Stale Record” from Herneos. People say they’ve seen them near the Small Dorians.

English: So, is this your grand discovery?
Russian: So, is this your grand discovery?

English: I don’t know what it is either, but I know someone who might.
Russian: I don’t know what it is either, but I know someone who might.

English: Go see [Knight Master] Karandur.
Russian: Go see [Knight Master] Karandur.

English: Go see [Blade Master] Corel.
Russian: Go see [Blade Master] Corel.

English: Go see [Elementor Master] Horison.
Russian: Go see [Elementor Master] Horison.

English: Go see [Psykeeper Master] Cylor.
Russian: Go see [Psykeeper Master] Cylor.

English: Go see [Jester Master] Lorein.
Russian: Go see [Jester Master] Lorein.

English: Go see [Ranger Master] Eliff.
Russian: Go see [Ranger Master] Eliff.

English: Go see [Billposter Master] Ride.
Russian: Go see [Billposter Master] Ride.

English: Go see [Ringmaster Master] Ellend.
Russian: Go see [Ringmaster Master] Ellend.

English: He’s an expert on ancient artifacts. Even if it doesn’t help your awakening, at least it’ll satisfy your curiosity.
Russian: He’s an expert on ancient artifacts. Even if it doesn’t help your awakening, at least it’ll satisfy your curiosity.

English: She’s an expert on ancient artifacts. Even if it doesn’t help your awakening, at least it’ll satisfy your curiosity.
Russian: She’s an expert on ancient artifacts. Even if it doesn’t help your awakening, at least it’ll satisfy your curiosity.

English: There’s plenty of time. Once you’ve handled your urgent matters, come back. I’ll let them know in advance.
Russian: There’s plenty of time. Once you’ve handled your urgent matters, come back. I’ll let them know in advance.

English: What are you waiting for? He’s expecting you.
Russian: What are you waiting for? He’s expecting you.

English: What are you waiting for? She’s expecting you.
Russian: What are you waiting for? She’s expecting you.

English: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Mercenary Master] Andy.
Russian: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Mercenary Master] Andy.

English: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Magician Master] Hee.
Russian: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Magician Master] Hee.

English: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Acrobat Master] Pyre.
Russian: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Acrobat Master] Pyre.

English: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Assist Master] Maki.
Russian: It’s been a while, adventurer. I already heard from [Assist Master] Maki.

English: You have something to show me, and you’re searching for clues about awakening?
Russian: You have something to show me, and you’re searching for clues about awakening?

English: Let me see the item first.
Russian: Let me see the item first.

English: Meet [Knight Master] Karandur.
Russian: Meet [Knight Master] Karandur.

English: Meet [Blade Master] Corel
Russian: Meet [Blade Master] Corel

English: Meet [Elementor Master] Horison
Russian: Meet [Elementor Master] Horison

English: Meet [Psykeeper Master] Cylor
Russian: Meet [Psykeeper Master] Cylor

English: Meet [Jester Master] Lorein
Russian: Meet [Jester Master] Lorein

English: Meet [Ranger Master] Eliff
Russian: Meet [Ranger Master] Eliff

English: Meet [Billposter Master] Ride
Russian: Meet [Billposter Master] Ride

English: Meet [Ringmaster Master] Ellend
Russian: Meet [Ringmaster Master] Ellend

English: Oh… this has nothing to do with awakening.
Russian: Oh… this has nothing to do with awakening.

English: It says that long ago, all continents were connected, and many races lived together.
Russian: It says that long ago, all continents were connected, and many races lived together.

English: This is exactly the kind of thing the Strange Collector in Saint City loves. He’d be thrilled if you brought it to him.
Russian: This is exactly the kind of thing the Strange Collector in Saint City loves. He’d be thrilled if you brought it to him.

English: Now then… shall we speak about your awakening?
Russian: Now then… shall we speak about your awakening?

English: True strength awakens when you fight with your life on the line. It’s always been that way.
Russian: True strength awakens when you fight with your life on the line. It’s always been that way.

English: Enter the instance dungeon and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s to test your limits.
Russian: Enter the instance dungeon and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s to test your limits.

English: Is there another way? Maybe. It’s worth trying whatever you can. If you change your mind, come find me.
Russian: Is there another way? Maybe. It’s worth trying whatever you can. If you change your mind, come find me.

English: You haven’t finished yet? Hmm… I thought you’d be done by now.
Russian: You haven’t finished yet? Hmm… I thought you’d be done by now.

English: Well done. But you still haven’t awakened? How strange…
Russian: Well done. But you still haven’t awakened? How strange…

English: I know someone who can definitely help—if you’re willing to meet them.
Russian: I know someone who can definitely help—if you’re willing to meet them.

English: Here, take this letter of introduction.
Russian: Here, take this letter of introduction.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s
Russian: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s

English: He is my master. Since he’s also a transcendent, he should know how.
Russian: He is my master. Since he’s also a transcendent, he should know how.

English: Because of certain circumstances, he doesn’t appear in public, so most people don’t know he exists.
Russian: Because of certain circumstances, he doesn’t appear in public, so most people don’t know he exists.

English: I just realized I gave you the letter without even hearing your answer.
Russian: I just realized I gave you the letter without even hearing your answer.

English: Anyway, you don’t know where he is yet, do you? Will you go meet him?
Russian: Anyway, you don’t know where he is yet, do you? Will you go meet him?

English: These days, my master is secretly building a tower. He should still be there.
Russian: These days, my master is secretly building a tower. He should still be there.

English: Show him my letter. He won’t ignore it.
Russian: Show him my letter. He won’t ignore it.

English: Even for me, this is a big favor to ask. If you feel you’re not ready, you can come back later.
Russian: Even for me, this is a big favor to ask. If you feel you’re not ready, you can come back later.

English: Go meet him quickly. He’s… a busy man.
Russian: Go meet him quickly. He’s… a busy man.

English: Only a handful of people know I’m here. Who are you, and what do you want?
Russian: Only a handful of people know I’m here. Who are you, and what do you want?

English: Deliver “Master’s Letter of Introduction” to [Mysterious] ???
Russian: Deliver “Master’s Letter of Introduction” to [Mysterious] ???

English: I see… the power inside you isn’t enough to awaken as a transcendent.
Russian: I see… the power inside you isn’t enough to awaken as a transcendent.

English: Still, you have the potential to reach a whole new realm.
Russian: Still, you have the potential to reach a whole new realm.

English: [Knight Master] Karandur even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Knight Master] Karandur even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Blade Master] Corel even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Blade Master] Corel even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Elementor Master] Horison even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Elementor Master] Horison even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Psykeeper Master] Cylor even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Psykeeper Master] Cylor even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Jester Master] Lorein even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Jester Master] Lorein even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Ranger Master] Eliff even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Ranger Master] Eliff even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Billposter Master] Ride even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Billposter Master] Ride even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: [Ringmaster Master] Ellend even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.
Russian: [Ringmaster Master] Ellend even wrote you a letter of introduction just to send you to me.

English: But I’m not sure I want to help someone I barely know.
Russian: But I’m not sure I want to help someone I barely know.

English: Can you do exactly as I say, without question? It’s nothing difficult.
Russian: Can you do exactly as I say, without question? It’s nothing difficult.

English: See the orbs scattered around Kaillun? Choose the one that draws you and bring it to me. I need to look into your past.
Russian: See the orbs scattered around Kaillun? Choose the one that draws you and bring it to me. I need to look into your past.

English: I have no regrets about this choice. Think carefully.
Russian: I have no regrets about this choice. Think carefully.

English: If you can’t even handle this, that sort of power would only weigh you down.
Russian: If you can’t even handle this, that sort of power would only weigh you down.

English: Hmm… I believe you’ll be fine.
Russian: Hmm… I believe you’ll be fine.

English: I’ll gladly help you open the door to a new realm.
Russian: I’ll gladly help you open the door to a new realm.

English: Stay right where you are.\nIt’s done. I need to rest now, so you may leave.
Russian: Stay right where you are.\nIt’s done. I need to rest now, so you may leave.

English: Get a $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$
Russian: Get a $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$

English: It’s done. Do you feel anything?
Russian: It’s done. Do you feel anything?

English: I need to rest, so go back to the sage who sent you here.
Russian: I need to rest, so go back to the sage who sent you here.

English: The ritual definitely worked. Take a bit more time to reflect on yourself, then come to me again.
Russian: The ritual definitely worked. Take a bit more time to reflect on yourself, then come to me again.

English: I said you may go now.
Russian: I said you may go now.

English: Welcome, adventurer. Have you finally awakened?\nThis is my first time seeing a transcendent in person.
Russian: Welcome, adventurer. Have you finally awakened?\nThis is my first time seeing a transcendent in person.

English: You say you haven’t awakened, yet I can clearly sense your power.\nSo, what happened?
Russian: You say you haven’t awakened, yet I can clearly sense your power.\nSo, what happened?

English: I see. So that’s how it went.\nYou may not have become a transcendent, but I’ll give you a small gift to celebrate your new strength.
Russian: I see. So that’s how it went.\nYou may not have become a transcendent, but I’ll give you a small gift to celebrate your new strength.

English: I look forward to seeing what you do next.
Russian: I look forward to seeing what you do next.

Russian: Go to [Sage] Radyon
